description: Bennit A.I. is a self-learning, highly personalized virtual production assistant specifically designed for industry

What is sulfur blooming? 
 If the rolls of stored material are not promptly utilized, they can lose their tacky quality. This makes it difficult, if not impossible, for the components to properly adhere together before vulcanization. In the latter stages of degradation, sulfur can be visualized on the surface of the components as a white or grayish layer which is called sulfur blooming.

What is the biggest problem to running more efficiently, in your own opinion?  E.g., Is there a piece of equipment that regularly breaks down?  Do you get inventory pileups due to constantly changing orders?  Not enough labor?  Your boss is a jerk?  etc.

What is vulcanization? 
 Subsequent to tire assembly, the green tire is transferred for vulcanization. The tire is coated with a liquid to ensure that it will not stick to the mold. In the mold the green tire is placed over an inflatable rubber bladder. Typically, the vulcanizing machine is a two piece metal mold. The bladder forces the tire against the mold, forming the sidewall patterns and tread pattern. The molding is accomplished through the use of steam pressure or hot water inside of the bladder.

values: $name, as soon as we are connected to the plant data, I can provide your with plant and equipment performance related information such as OEE, etc.
$name, as soon as we are connected to the plant data, I'll let you know who is not available or absent today.

$name, as your personal production assistant, I can let you know of equipment that's down, provide your with equipment status, provide assistants during safety or near-miss incidents, capture and update your details, do surveys, record our daily interaction, show reports, and address specific types of domain-specific manufacturing related questions. I'm also learning and my capabilities are continuously being expanded with respect to instant access to performance information, troubleshooting, real-time collaboration, production optimization, general assistance, and personal time optimization. Some key commands currently are for example: safety/problem/danger, downtime/down, start, update/change, leaving, reports, status, survey/discovery, learn, going to work, phone, text, funny, help/advice/recommend, thanks, cursing, etc. My advice is to be as productive as possible and to focus on achieving your goals for today.
$name, I know your name. How can I help you?
$name, please specify your TI Sensortag device id.
$name, the top 3 issues in Tire Assembly over the last 3 months have been equipment down, starved out of stock, and some quality problems

dialog_nodes.conditions: input.text.contains( 'tire assembly') || input.text.contains( 'tire building') || input.text.contains( 'common issues') || input.text.matches( '[ a-zA-Z0-9.,/;<>?~!@#$%^&*()_+{}|\:]+' )

values: $name, which machines are you interested in?
OK $name. What user information needs to be updated? Role, Area, or Equipment/Machine?

What are quality problems should be avoided in appropriate tire building practices? 
 Appropriate building practices require that components which have lost their tackiness, especially components with sulfur bloom, be scrapped. Most manufacturers, however, allow their tire builders to utilize petroleum solvents to freshen belt material or body plies that have lost their tackiness or which demonstrate sulfur bloom. Use of the petroleum solvent which is supposed to remove the sulfur, but sometimes merely masks it, and can cause pockets of trapped gas between components, and can allow the uncured components to move so that the precise alignment necessary for steel belts is compromised unless the solvent is completely dry when the components are assembled.
